an5.24:1.1: “Mendicants, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.
an5.24:1.2: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.
an5.24:1.3: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.
an5.24:1.4: When there is no disillusionment and dispassion, one who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.24:1.5: Suppose there was a tree that lacked branches and foliage.
an5.24:1.6: Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would not grow to fullness.
an5.24:1.7: In the same way, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.
an5.24:1.8: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.
an5.24:1.9: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.
an5.24:1.10: When there is no disillusionment and dispassion, one who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.24:2.1: An ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.
an5.24:2.2: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.
an5.24:2.3: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.
an5.24:2.4: When there is disillusionment and dispassion, one who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.24:2.5: Suppose there was a tree that was complete with branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would all grow to fullness.
an5.24:2.6: In the same way, an ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.
an5.24:2.7: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.
an5.24:2.8: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.
an5.24:2.9: When there is disillusionment and dispassion, one who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.”
